Reviews.Title: “horrible hotel + staff stole my shirt.”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights looked ok outside coming nightmare begins hairs sheets hairs toilet seat soap shampoo else shower supposed 4 star hotel breakfast poor normal coffee hot water cup tea staff putting uneaten food horrible day lovey stay completed staff stole favourite shirt needles found laundry claimed sum yourself favor dont

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel I've attended to”

Reviews.Content: 3 nights hotel location 510 minutes ramblas worst issue maid stole shirts girlfriend complaining left details feedback travelled lot visited quality low hotel bad dirty sheets dirty washed noticed human hair bathtub toilet smell bad handle window removed window unfortunately breakfast cheap satisfying plates glasses dirty shame noticed cleaning lady returning pastries eaten fresh baskets shoked bad experience dont understand 4 stars recommend

Reviews.Content: hotel staff friendly helpful nicely decorated shower leaked bit smell dampness window wide door am wrong thinking lot hotels smell city english speaking tv channels free wi fi except cable allow laptop leave table disco road wake alright hotel location nice restraunts nearby easy cent mallorca breakfast stocked plenty meats cheese bread cereal nice coffee altho poorly stocked weekends mid week nice helpful girl weekends chilled missed coffee chocolate croissants lovely fruit available 2 blocks placa excellent walking distance nice plenty nice shops closeby zara stay
